io.spine.server.transport

Interface TransportFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryTransportFactory, SingleThreadInMemTransportFactory

    @SPI
public interface TransportFactory
extends Closeable
    A factory for creating channel-based transport for Message inter-exchange between the current deployment component and other application parts. Inspired by Publish-Subscriber Channel pattern.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Publisher createPublisher(io.spine.server.transport.ChannelId id)
      Creates a Publisher channel with the given ID.
      Subscriber createSubscriber(io.spine.server.transport.ChannelId id)
      Creates a Subscriber channel with the given ID.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.spine.server.Closeable

        checkOpen, isOpen

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • createPublisher

        Publisher createPublisher(io.spine.server.transport.ChannelId id)
        Creates a Publisher channel with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the resulting channel
        Returns:
        a new Publisher instance

      • createSubscriber

        Subscriber createSubscriber(io.spine.server.transport.ChannelId id)
        Creates a Subscriber channel with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the resulting channel
        Returns:
        a new Subscriber instance
